backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report declaring no collected features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light and dark OKLCH color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes with auth gating and provides the app’s router provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthCard.ts: Reusable styled authentication card with error display, submit handling, and footer navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Route guard that redirects based on Internet Identity auth state and shows a loading screen during init.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPageLay: Page layout wrapper for login/register pages with branding, gradient background, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/StorageName: Sets per-principal localStorage namespace based on authenticated Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logout button that clears auth and redirects to login.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Project card UI supporting cover image upload, navigation to project screenplay, and display of project info.
frontend/src/components/screenplay/BeatC: Beat display card showing metadata, guidance, and a textarea for editing beat content.
frontend/src/components/screenplay/Scree: Tabbed navigation for screenplay structures, references, and characters, rendering the appropriate tab content.
frontend/src/components/screenplay/tabs/: Manages project characters with add, delete, select, and edit functionality using local storage.
Loads and edits Dan Harmon story circle beat content for a project.
Displays and updates Fichtean Curve beat entries sourced from project data.
Renders Hero's Journey beats and saves per‑beat content changes.
Provides a large textarea for editing and storing project reference notes.
Shows Save the Cat beats and persists user‑entered text for each beat.
Displays the three‑act structure with nested beats and saves beat content updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables and utilities for theme, layout, and accessibility.
frontend/src/lib/beatDefinitions.ts: Defines interfaces for beats and act sections and provides the Save the Cat beat list with detailed metadata.
frontend/src/lib/pdfExport.ts: Generates a text-based PDF export of screenplay data using multiple story structures and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: Manages namespaced localStorage for projects, profiles, themes, and screenplay data, including creation and updates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/IndexPage.tsx: Displays the project index with theme and profile controls, allowing project creation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login via Internet Identity and redirects on success using an authentication UI layout.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides a profile editor for user details and profile image with save and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Handles account creation with Internet Identity using shared authentication components.
frontend/src/pages/ScreenplayPage.tsx: React page that loads a project and its data, displays a themed screenplay workspace with tabs, and provides navigation and PDF export.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for projects, profiles, screenplay structures, characters, and project data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON state document describing app goals, architecture notes, existing features, and metadata for the BRICK BY BRICK project.
